text: The Men's 800 metre freestyle competition of the 2018 African Swimming Championships was held on 11 September 2018. ==Records== Prior to the competition, the existing world and championship records were as follows. {| class=wikitable style=text-align:center |- ! !! Name !! Nation !! Time !! Location !! Date |- |World record||align=left|Zhang Lin||align=left|||align=left|7:32.12||Rome||29 July 2009 |- |African record||align=left|Oussama Mellouli||align=left|||align=left|7:35.27||Rome||29 July 2009 |- |Championship record||align=left|Troyden Prinsloo||align=left|||align=left|8:03.34||Casablanca||4 May 2004 |} The following new records were set during this competition. {| class="wikitable" style=text-align:center |- ! Date !! Event !! Name !! Nationality !! Time !!
